long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is to help with productivity, it limits the time it takes for a user to access websites. This is the light themed version.

No ads is displayed and it is free of cost.

Icons used are made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
